comment: Cheers to the police in France. Job well done!!! The whole world held their breath praying for you & hostages.
amr:
# ::snt Cheers to the police in France. Job well done!!! The whole world held their breath praying for you & hostages.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cheer-01
            :ARG0 (p / police
                  :location (c2 / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "France"))))
      :snt2 (d / do-02
            :ARG1 (j / job
                  :ARG1-of (w / well-09)))
      :snt3 (h / hold-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / world
                  :mod (w3 / whole))
            :ARG1 (b / breathe-01
                  :ARG0 w2)
            :manner (p2 / pray-01
                  :ARG0 w2
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (y / you)
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :name n
                              :op1 "amp"))
                  :ARG1-of (h2 / hostage-01))))
